data.name: First Time in Paris Demo
data.detailed_description:
A new Hidden Object adventure begins! Kate Robinson is an amateur travel blogger who's taking on her first big job—and it's in Paris! Join her and her daughter Nicole as they save the Hotel Hospitalité, all while making new friends and new memories in the City of Love!



Explore lavishly illustrated and animated locations and help Kate save the Hotel Hospitalité!



Discover the magic of Paris through over 30 different minigames!
data.about_the_game:
A new Hidden Object adventure begins! Kate Robinson is an amateur travel blogger who's taking on her first big job—and it's in Paris! Join her and her daughter Nicole as they save the Hotel Hospitalité, all while making new friends and new memories in the City of Love!



Explore lavishly illustrated and animated locations and help Kate save the Hotel Hospitalité!



Discover the magic of Paris through over 30 different minigames!
data.short_description: Join amateur travel blogger Kate Robinson and her daughter Nicole as they go on their first big business trip to save a Parisian hotel!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 1GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 64-bit 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 64-bit 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
